name: Flicker VR
description:
An asymmetrical local multiplayer horror game where one player explores an abandoned house in VR while another player uses the mouse and keyboard to stalk and hunt the other player.

Currently only supports Oculus Rift controls for VR player, and mouse and keyboard for the PC player.

**Credits**

Zed Poirier – Technical Lead
Ankit Choudhari – Lead Game Design & UI Design
Santiago A. Lopez – Art Lead
Arun Babu – Production Lead & VFX
Shyamal Pancholi – Rigging and Animation
Nick Altmayer – Sound Design
Tristan Sahadeo – Additional SFX & VFX
